90% of women use regular soap with sulphates & parabens to cleanse all over — including their intimate area. But not all soaps & body wash are formulated at the appropriate pH range for the intimate area. The pH levels of your vagina can be altered by things as simple as stress, diet, and fluctuating hormones. Our Intimate feminine spray helps combat all of this by maintaining and balancing your natural pH levels while making you feel your absolute best. The ingredients work together to deeply moisturize, soften, nourish, balance and restore the delicate tissues of your delicate parts while also promoting skin tone and eliminating odour.
